content.detailedDescription: I was with my mon and son at pier 39 in san francisco and decided to take a picture of alcatraz island to post to facebook from my droid bionic on full zoom. i never noticed the obdject in the sky untill i looked at the picture . let me say again i never saw the obdject untill looking at the picture some time later. it is in the to left of the picture. thanks looking into tis matter . i thought it was quite siginifigant. ragards, john m. poulson
content.summary: It looks like a cowboy hat, grey color.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my mon and son at pier 39 in san francisco and decided to take a picture of alcatraz island to post to facebook from my droid bionic on full zoom. i never noticed the obdject in the sky untill i looked at the picture . let me say again i never saw the obdject untill looking at the picture some time later. it is in the to left of the picture. thanks looking into tis matter . i thought it was quite siginifigant. ragards, john m. poulson
content.summary: It looks like a cowboy hat, grey color.

content.detailedDescription: We were heading west on county road g12 toward wilsons island state park around 9:00 p.M. to fish at the river. we saw a bright light directly in front of us. couldn't judge the distance yet. assumed it was a airplane just turning to land, as it was 20 miles north of epply airport. we kept heading straight as this road is about 5 miles long before it makes a slight right curve then straight again for another 2 miles. it is surrounded on both sides  by farm fields. it's flat because it is old river bottom. a few farm yards along the road. after the slight curve and straight again is when we first thought it was strange because only now did it seem to be not moving. at the beginning of state ground (wilsons island on the left, de soto bend on the right) it turns forested on both sides. we slowed the car to about 5 m.P.H. and went directly under the object. i looked out the window and directly up. it was not a airplane but was a machine of some kind but did not make any noise. it didn't seem to be moving. there are trees about 50 feet on both sides of the road so with the road i would estimate it's 150 feet between the trees and the object was well over the trees on both sides. i would guess it was 20 to 30 feet above the trees. mostly old growth cottonwood around 80 to 100 feet tall. i ducked back in the car and the other person asked what it was and i said "i don't know" and we just went on. we turned left into the gates of wilsons but don't remember looking back. we went to the south west river access which has a fairly open view of the sky towards omaha and i didn't see any airplanes headed there to land. it is strange that i didn't get out and get a better look because i don't remember being scared. i don't understand why i can't better describe it. after all these years i still remember heading towards it, looking up and seeing it, no noise, and just driving away, like it was no big deal? another note about that night was the town of missouri valley had a huge main transformer blow and the town was without power over night. missouri valley is about 15 miles from wilsons island.
content.summary: Saw bright light while traveling a long straight road.

content.detailedDescription: i was about 1977, i was on my way home from a friend home across the north carolina state line . i was driving a 1966 chevelet station wagon with the windows up and i suddenly notice an flying object coming across the tree tops and it was perfectly timed to fly directly over my car. what was so strange that it did not make one sound, lights were flashing so when i figured it has flown over the car their was a large field directly to my right so i look over to see what it was but i did not see anything. this happen in about 4 second. from it speed it should been visible in the field so when i look forward my headlight were so bright that i could see about 3/4 mile down the road and that all i rememeber, but the next day which was on a sunday, i was awaking by my father checking the car because it had caught fire and burned. what i did't understand is i did't have any fuel in it. it was on empty. i think whatever it was that night put a device in there to torch the car. i have been visit twice more in my life time starting from about 3 years old another was about 12 years old which involved my father which he is still trying to get me to explain.  i remember a cream white light not like a light bulb which was surrounded by a perfect blue fading light had me suspended and i came down from the ceiling and land on my father but i didn;t see what done it but what ever had me was not moving like humans. it was moving like a robot would left to right.
content.summary: Quietly came over the tree tops

content.detailedDescription: Siting on chair out front always skywatched seen before fast moving craft far away way faster than any plane no general direction changed couple times 1.S overn.J.Saw hover over same place 3 times only once was there so long i ran in house got camera phone got several pics  1 was close but looked blured in a square ? i can send to a cell pic phone.I.Ll try 2 e mail  i wish to remain anoynomous please
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw several over 1 month 3 hovered over n.J. about 5 to 10 miles away what i seen with my eyes diferent than camera screen 1 time snaped pic flew 10 miles to right over my house in seconds

content.detailedDescription:
In pickup travelling to our farm backfield. there was a quarter moon to the left. on the right side as i looked out of window, my husband was driving, i thought i seen another quarter moon. it changed shape to a veritable shape with 4 to 6 individual lights. it came down in a blink of the eye and looked like dull gray disc shape with a white/blue color lights. it was stationary above us. my husband got out of the truck and watched. i panicked and begged my husband to get us out of there. as we left the object followed us above the trees then disappeared. 

i am not sure of the length of time this event endured.

my husband has always been very reluctant to speak of that night. we both were of sound mind during that occurrence. i will never forget that date and time and it will go to the graveyard with me.
content.summary: Seen object in the night sky that had no reasonable explanation.

content.detailedDescription: i was going to the store for my mother @ about 7pm on southern ave. when i heard jet like sound. i looked up to see a dark grayish egg like object moving kinda quietly through the air. it looked like aburnet bricket from a bbq flying through the air, leaving a trial but its shap was that of a foot ball a little fatter inthe middel. their was a jet sound but not as loud an a after sound, the swishing of the air after it pased over head.I could see the burn on the object the little red hot spots in the frount a lessor amount toward the back. their was no lights,windos or anything that i could say some one could look out of, or running lights for safty. it scared me so bade i ran back home as fast as i could . i have never saw anything close or near like it,but i know what something sounds like moveing through the air, i live right near andrews airforce base,an have ben to lot of air showes up front an pearsonal. so i do no what the after sound sounds like after the jets ingens sound has stopped an the swashing sound of the air makes after the object has passed by.
content.summary: Heard jet like sound looked up saw it travle left to right looked as if it just came through the atmisfear leaving a light trial going toward washington captial .

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard on my trampoline and i saw the alien out of the corner of my eye.I saw it peering over my backyard fence. i knew it was an alien when i saw it. it disappeared when i looked at it straight on. i thought it was weird and it frightened me. it disappeared from sight when i looked at it.
content.summary: Peering over my backyard fence.

content.detailedDescription: Me and another truck driver parked our trucks in a holler fill next to a four lane highway wile we were waiting an talking i just happen to look up an noticed a big cylinder shiney object travelin prety qick and i said to my friend you see that he looked an i looked at him as we wartched it move out ofsight he wouldnt admit it but i watched his head move wile he watcheed we couldnt believe what we seen.So i never spoke about it.
content.summary: Gazeing at a prety day an noticed ufo

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 11:30pm and a saturday night in the begining of july, 2008.  i was going to the bathroom, standing at the toilet, in the second floor bathroom.  a bright light took the corner of my left eye.  turning to my left, i looked out the window, which looks out onto acres of cornfields, and saw the most intense white round light imaginable.  it pulsated/shimmed so badly and itensely that it actually kind of hurt my eyes and almost made me turn my eyes away.  it seemed to "shuttle" up and down a little, and the light began getting larger/closer.

i ran down the hall and woke my fiance and we ran back into bathroom and i showed her the light as well.  as we could see it was getting closer to the back of the house, i said let's go down onto the deck and see if we can see it.

we ran out onto the deck and in the couple seconds it took us to run down the stairs and out the back door, it was already hovering almost directly over head.  the object was triangle/boomerang shaped and had three white lights on its surface - one light on each "tip" of the triangle/boomerang.  i heard  very low, quiet "hum" and looked up at the object.  in a fraction of second - they object jetted over our heads and over the house and out of sight.

i do not have any physical evidence of the sighting, and wish i would have known that this organization existed when i witness this sighting.  i contimplated calling 911, but was unsure if i would have been "misusing" the 911 service.  i happened upon the segment about the bucks county, pa 2008 flap, was instantly moved to account my sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed one intense round pulsating white light from 2nd floor window, coming toward house and decending - ran out onto deck and object was over head in sky with three white lights on surface - shape like boomerang - hovered then took off over top of hous

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My wife was outside jumping rope when she looked up to a bright star (i think it is venus)and noticed 30-50 blue glowing spheres move through the sky around 9pm on feb 4th, 2012 (frisco, tx). she made me aware and when i stepped outside i also saw several blue spheres move from the north to the south. we were looking west about 50-60 degree from horizon). some were above the clouds and some were below the clouds and they moved faster than a plane. they were blue glowing spheres moving to the south. they disappeared in the distance to the south and some disappeared above the clouds. there was no noise associated with them at all. not sure what made us shake more, the cold weather last night or what we saw and could not explain...
content.summary: We saw a fleet of 30 - 50 blue spheres move through the sky

content.detailedDescription: Round it had three huge bright lights it huverd at a sied over a street for a second and disaperd.
content.summary: Round disaperd in second had huge bright light

content.detailedDescription: A companion and i were driving down highway 10 in palm desert, ca, coming home from dinner at approx 7 pm.  it was then that we noticed above us while we were driving in the night sky, a very large, bright, white, hovering saucer-shaped object/craft with a red light at its center, that did not move, but hovered above the desert slightly to our right beside the highway in the sky.  we first noticed the flying saucer because it was so circular and bright, and because of its bright, inner, red light, both which we had never seen before.  we thought, could it be a helicopter, could it be a plane, but it was not.  there were no blades, and the flying saucer was stationery, hovering while circling slowly above us, about a half mile away and above us.  the sky was clear and there were very few stars.  there were no visible aircraft in the sky at the time. for about 2 minutes, it hovered in one place while circling very slowly, descending slightly downwards, then it appeared to hover to either the left or to the right, circling slowly all the time.  during the entire time, we were amazed at its brightness, circular shape, and bright, inner, red light.  as we exited the freeway, it ascended and rose slightly, appearing near the mountains in a flash and change of direction that was faster than anything we had ever seen.  it was too fast to even see its movement across the sky.  during this time, my car radio suddenly turned on.  this has not happend to either of us before.  we are both educated, skeptical people and have never witnessed any ufo sighting- ever, or had a car radio mysteriously turn on.  we were fascinated and amazed, and i was somewhat afraid at the time, because of its large size, brightness, inner red light, speed, circular movement, and hovering capacity- it's ability to stay motionless in one place.  we lost sight of the object as it changed direction across the sky and moved away from us, appearing towards the distant mountains, descending somewhat lower in the sky.  we are both 100% certain that the object was not from our planet, we felt like it was watching us.  it's size was larger than any aircraft we had ever seen, brighter and whiter than anything, and very circular in size.  i was afraid when the radio turned on.  we had not been drinking or anything at all.  we feel very fortunate to have witnessed the sighting of a flying saucer and alien aircraft and ufo.
content.summary: Bright hovering flying saucer/ufo sighting- craft hovered while circling

content.detailedDescription: Was following a big object that was hovering with green red white lights.Went slow and hovered.It seemed like it wanted us to follow it
content.summary: Saw weird object in sky hovering going about 60mph flashing green red white lights

content.detailedDescription:
on 2/4/12 at approximately 0800 hrs, i was exercising in my tv room and looked out the window facing the nw. i noticed a disc shaped white object traveling at a rapid speed in a sw direction paralling the olympic mountains. after about 10 seconds it zig-zaged then disappeared from sight.
i have lived and now live near an airport and are used to seeing various aircraft,this did not act at all like an airplane. attached is a pic of the view from the position of the window
content.summary: Observed a disc shaped object move from the north to the south along the olympic mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my patio window to the southeastern sky. the disc blended into the cloud, was hovering for about 2 minutes. i couldn't be sure it was real but then realized it was. there was a bright flash of light and it was gone. left a trail for 1 to 2 seconds.
content.summary: Disc-shaped object, blended into cloud, hovered, bright flash then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:15 pm sat. feb. 4, 2012 rather low in the sky (below where most jets travel and above the treeline)in the north-eastern oakland county sky an orange rectangular-shaped object slowly moved in a western direction and then stopped.  it appeared to hover with the star-like orange light pulsating then died out without the object moving or falling from that position in the sky.  however, it must have moved when object was unlit because, the object reappeared and repeated the cycle.  total experience lasted just a few minutes.
content.summary: Rectangular object with orange star-like light, no noise low in sky moved slowly, hovered,light faded without object moving.  happened twice.

content.detailedDescription: It looks like a star. it just keeps glowing and descending. its not a star but it glows brightly. it stays in the sky for hours. people who live here are scared to talk because we have a nuclear power plant here. its been going on 4 two weeks.
content.summary: For the last two weeks. lights descending in our area.

content.detailedDescription: Hi, more orbs moving and dancing! looking around like a humming birds. sometimes small as a baseball, others large like a plane. white to orange. g.A. whittier.  more to come!
content.summary: Included selected orb shots. from several pix of moving orbs.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the lake, camping with my family, i couldn't sleep that night, my head was hurting. i few hours after just looking through the window, i saw 3 yellow/orange lights hovering, i first thought it was a plane, but there was no plane noise, only a slight hum. then a slight outline appeared around the lights, i looked closer and took my camera out but then it started flying away, in a zig-zag type motion, first up, then backwards and down, then up again a few times, i couldn't get the camera started, so i just looked at it, and it started dissolving away, or faded.
content.summary: A disc like shape with 4 orange lights flying up, in a zig-zag motion

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my driveway with a 60mm refractor that i just acquired this afternoon. i had just finished cleaning the optics and decided it was time for a star test. everything was perfect. i had been looking at mars, orion nebula and sirius. i noticed a red light coming in over the tree tops, about 20 degrees over the horizon from my vantage point. i thought it was a plane and i decided to track it with the scope.

i had a 25mm eyepiece in the draw tube. to my surprise the object was completely round, or so it appeared. it was a very bright reddish-orange color and appeared to pulsate in intensity as it flew from north to south. i tracked the object for well over a minute. i thought it might be some sort of blimp but the light was very intense. as it headed south and became smaller in my eyepiece it seemed to stop or hover in the distance.

this object made no sound. i am used to tracking aircraft with my scopes and i never tracked anything like this, nor have i ever witnessed a craft like this. there were no flashing lights on the craft. unlike the other aircraft in the area this one was totally different. as it flew south i noticed a commercial jet coming in from the west and wondered if the pilot had noticed the craft as well.
content.summary: Observed bright reddish-orange light while stargazing

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in  busch gardens heading towards rides and all.And how i notice it was i was looking at the sky in front of me and i saw a fireball slowly hovering i stared at it for a good 10 secs or less.I knew it was a fireball as soon as i saw it. it was hovering slowly didnt turn at all just kept moving slanted away from me.I was amazed and shocked i allways wanted to see a ufo and that day i did and when it was gone i looked away like noting happen but i felt amazed.I lost sight of the fireball when it went behind a tree well a few trees.
content.summary: Fireball moving slowly at busch gardens it was kinda big but i was pretty far from the fireball.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in  busch gardens heading towards rides and all.And how i notice it was i was looking at the sky in front of me and i saw a fireball slowly hovering i stared at it for a good 10 secs or less.I knew it was a fireball as soon as i saw it. it was hovering slowly didnt turn at all just kept moving slanted away from me.I was amazed and shocked i allways wanted to see a ufo and that day i did and when it was gone i looked away like noting happen but i felt amazed.I lost sight of the fireball when it went behind a tree well a few trees.
content.summary: Fireball moving slowly at busch gardens it was kinda big but i was pretty far from the fireball.

content.detailedDescription: A friend had just left my house and called me on my cell and told me to come outside and look south there was something strange . i went out in my driveway and saw a object with 2 bright lights with a smaller yellow light in the center. my friend by this time was out of his car and we were watching this thing. it was not going very fast, as it got closer we could then see all the lights   so we knew it wasn't a plane or anything that we have seen before.He has a picture that he took with phone, it was a little ways away by the time he thought of getting a picture, but you can see the shape and lights.It did not make any sound.
content.summary: Alot of bright lights, no sound,

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing a ufo every night now since 2/2/2012. i look up for ufo's once in a while but i haven't till recently i had a feeling to look out my kitchen window and i saw what i think is a ufo. i stand out on my deck by my side door and from there the craft seems to hover in a 240 degree westerly direction. it seems to be in our atmosphere to me. it had white, blue and some red light somehow coming off the object, looking at it with my binoculaurs almost seemed like it had electricity shooting from it which seemed to be how the light was emmiting from it, not sure. i think it could be hovering over keno which is the next town over. i could not really dtermine an actual shape but it seemed it could be spherical, diamond and or saucer shaped but not sure too far away. the last time it showed up 2/4/2012 at 7:40 pm to 7:58 pm. im in my house watching t.V. or working on science projects. i lost sight of the object due to a free-way over pass blocking my view when the object seems to go down towards earth. my video is not great but you have to watch out for the street light and a big rig truck wich passes by leaving streaking lights, just focus on the little light in the center of the screen, this is the object.
content.summary: I keep seeing a ufo every night for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Me and my parents were watching tv then i looked out of the window and i saw these 6 to 10 orange orbs flying right behind each other heading north there was no noise at all they were flying right behind each other, not long after they disappeared i heard weird noises like trumpets and buzzing noises. i lost sight of the object when it went past the treeline.
content.summary: Orange and red orbs flying right behind each other

content.detailedDescription: About 7:15 pm.I let my dogs outside and noticed 2 bright yellow lights in the eastern sky.At first i thought maybe with clear sky and almost full moon maybe it was a couple of planets , or maybe one planet and a star. then i thought it shouldn't be pulsating .So i came in the house to get my husdband, and i looked back thru the window and the first one was gone then the second dimmed out, and was gone.There was no sound, but they were pretty far away.
content.summary: Pulsating yellow bright lights.

content.detailedDescription:
While outside smoking a cigarette, i looked up at the sky and noticed the moon behind the clouds. as i watched the clouds passing in the north east direction, i noticed a giant puncture hole through the clouds perfectly shaped as a triagle. soon after there was another hole about the same size with no defined shape. these were the only two holes in these clouds that clearly stood out from any normal clouds that i have ever seen.     
       my opinion is that something either traveled up or down through the clouds displacing the cloud itself enough to leave such a defined shape. 
note: 
the only light visible through the clouds was the light of the moon, except when i looked through the triangle, i could see the stars clearly.
i saw this for 15 minutes as the clouds went by slowly before they drifted out of view, the triangle maintained its shape through out the sighting.

i felt i should report this.

thanks, 

ed
content.summary: A perfect triagle hole in the clouds

content.detailedDescription: At home in the early morning hours of feb 4 2012, my nephew and his wife returned from a family function and advised m of a strange multi-colored object in the sky.I expectd to see a star, planet or satellite. i went outside to try to see what they had described and observed a distant self illuminating multi color light-emitting object in the sky west/southwest of monmouth oregon. the object was very distant, but clearly not a star or planet or other natural body. the sky was very clear, and once i had advised my sister to come outside to see it for herself, we decided to drive in the direction of the object to see if we could get a better view of it outside of the city proper and away from light pollution. the object exhibited some movement, but remained visible the entire time. we drove down highway 99, and followed airlie rd. to maxwell creek rd.We pulled over several times and shut the lights of the vehicle off, and through binoculars obseved what appeared to be a spherical craft with a constant bright white light, and randomly displayed green, red and blue lights. it moved back and fourth several times in a small area, but seemed to be hovering steadily at it's location. at this time we decided not to drive any farther from home, deciding that the object was getting bigger as we drove in it's direction, but not much. on our return drive home, my sister observed it disappear, not move off or fly away, just vanish. overall, six people we know of saw this object as it stayed in the sky for over a hour and a half between the hours of 1:15am and 2:30am the morning of february 4 2012. cell phone camera shots were not able to catch the object in a decent photo.
content.summary: Self illuminated non ballistic motion ufo west/southwest of monmouth-independence oregon on feb. 4 2012

content.detailedDescription: I let the dog outside at about 8pm and a light was in the sky towards the west of my house. i thought it was a bright star at first. then the clouds started to move in and the light was under the cloud cover. then i thought that it might be a rescue helicopter looking for someone in the puget sound, but this object didn't make any noise. this is the second time in a few weeks that this type of object has been here. it pulsated bright white to blue then to a reddish color then slightly green to a blueish green.It slowly moved to the west and was very bright then dim and the bright again. i kept saying that this must be a helicopter but it didn't seem to fly like a helicopter.It flew in relatively a straight line but would stop and hover,then become bright,from my vantage i watched this for an hr and a half. in this time frame it went from over the sound to the horizon and disappeared.Not sure exactly what it was, but thought it should be reported. hope this helps, thank you. ps, i tried to take a video with my phone but it wasn't showing up very well!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light that at first thought was a star, then clouds showed it was under the clouds. bright pulsating light.
